channel.title: Suggestion for mark all topics read
channel.description:
Okay. What needs to happen. You know the "Mark all messages read" button? Towards the bottem right corner?
Well. That needs to be fixed. I'm sick of pressing that on moparscape, yet it still erases my mitb unread ones. leik wtf??? hao i ment to leik read da gud mitb st00f??? pls men halp.
Edit: How about yes.

item.title: Suggestion for mark all topics read
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:7, topic:161424”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=219692.msg1905802#msg1905802 date=1196399750]
grammar is different from spelling. all i did was spell a few words wrong and forget a comma.
[/quote]

You also forgot to mention you raped the sentence while you forgot that comma.

I’m sick of pressing that on moparscape

A solution, don’t go to moparsacpe.[/quote]
Thats true. I will attempt to communicate my idea in a better form.

In this page: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=unread try and make more distance in between “all unread topics” and “mark all messages read”

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion for mark all topics read
